name: Tivara
headline: Using LLMs to automate insurance approval for healthcare clinics

founders.name: Tej Seelamsetty, Founder
founders.description:
Founder and CEO of Tivara.

I started my entrepreneurship journey at 18 years old: As soon as I could sign a personal guarantee, I started flipping houses to (successfully) pay for college. Building software to automate the tedious aspects of my own due diligence opened my eyes to the magic of code. Since then, I led growth (10x-ed revenue) at Fair Square (W20) and worked as a consultant at Bain. I studied computer science and financial engineering at WashU.

founders.name: Aumesh Misra, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO of Tivara. I've spent 4 years building software at Microsoft and Compound (YC S19). I was the 8th engineer at Compound and helped grow the company to over $2B AUM. Prior to this, I researched and developed software for novel medical imaging devices at Stanford.

raw_markdown='[Tivara](https://tivara.com/</>)[Features](https://tivara.com/<#feature>)[Team](https://tivara.com/<#team>)
Get a demo
# We automate prior authorizations,so you can deliver care faster
Care-critical prior authorizations approved 30x faster and at 80% lower cost, seamlessly integrated into your practice's workflow.
Get a demo
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668db74bcef5ad41507dcb8d_Screenshot%202024-07-09%20at%202.19.38%E2%80%AFPM.png)
## One-click submission
Generate authorization requests that are pre-filled directly from provider orders and patient charts.
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668db7074d5f758079082b63_check-circle-duotone.svg)
Average submission time reduced ~30x
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668db7074d5f758079082b63_check-circle-duotone.svg)
Submit authorization requests to any payor
![check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668db7074d5f758079082b63_check-circle-duotone.svg)
Edit any field before submitting
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ed81bc8d30cc42aa39342_Screenshot%202024-07-09%20at%202.20.46%E2%80%AFPM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ee6a17f22ad8c220d3ede_screen.jpg)
## Transparency into the full auth request lifecycle
Monitor where every request stands with your payors without ever getting on the phone.
![user icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668db7074d5f758079082b62_users-four-duotone.svg)
### Full team visibility into authorization requests
Never again wonder if a patient is authorized for an upcoming visit.
![arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668db7074d5f758079082b61_arrows-clockwise-duotone.svg)
### Automated payor follow-ups
Our software polls your payors for the latest status, freeing your team from the manual burden of calling each payor for each auth.
## Analytics for your end-to-end prior auth workflow
See how your team is performing across KPIs that track every step of the prior authorization workflow.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668eed9e920dae80d3683875_analytics%20frame.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ed9bb540480b19428792c_ab597032-c5aa-47ca-80bd-3671c5205f40.jpeg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ed9bacb76d85554e93f82_cerner.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668edb24e29cf6fa6fbd2fb4_flatiron.png)
## Connect any EMR
Generate authorization requests directly from patient charts in any EMR.
Get a demo
## Founders
As patients, we've experienced the pain of delayed treatment from slow prior authorization. We're building for a world where doctors quarterback our care, not insurance policies.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ee256db833d4676fc90e1_tej_headshot_small.jpg)Tej SeelamsettyCo-Founder, CEO](https://tivara.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/tej-seelamsetty/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ee42d5ad226295383e1ae_60624e78c00626649d03d63b060c3e1a.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ee42d871dfe16d22c2c51_images.png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ee256d9aa196d23a87a7b_aumesh_headshot_small.jpg)Aumesh MisraCo-Founder, CTO](https://tivara.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/aumesh-misra/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ee42da667901c70a69afb_Microsoft_logo.svg.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668db7064d5f758079082aa8/668ee42dbe2556b71eadd5cb_compound.jpg)
info@tivara.com
[Tivara](https://tivara.com/</>)
[Privacy Policy](https://tivara.com/<https:/www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/25183797> "Privacy Policy ")

generated_description:
**Tivara: Automating Healthcare Insurance Approvals**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch S24, Tivara is a forward-looking startup on a mission to revolutionize the healthcare insurance approval process. Their innovative use of large language models (LLMs) aims to streamline prior authorizations for healthcare clinics, making them both faster and more cost-effective.

The company is based entirely online, minimizing overhead while maximizing reach, and they currently operate with a lean team of just two dedicated employees. At the helm are co-founders Tej Seelamsetty (CEO) and Aumesh Misra (CTO), both of whom are motivated by personal experiences with frustrating delays in healthcare services stemming from slow insurance approvals.

### What Tivara Does

Tivara is all about speed and efficiency in handling prior authorizations. Here’s how they’re shaking things up:

- **Rapid Approvals**: The platform claims to approve care-critical prior authorizations at a staggering 30 times the speed of traditional processes, all while reducing costs by up to 80%. This means clinics can serve patients faster, which is a win for everyone involved.
  
- **One-Click Submission**: With Tivara, authorization requests are generated directly from provider orders and patient charts, significantly cutting down the time needed for submissions. This feature not only expedites the process but also minimizes errors.

- **Transparency and Tracking**: Tivara's system allows clinics to monitor the status of every authorization request without the need for endless phone calls, delivering much-needed clarity to the often opaque insurance approval process.

- **Analytics Dashboard**: They provide clinics with analytics to track key performance indicators, giving insights into where workflow inefficiencies might be and how teams can improve over time.

- **EMR Integration**: The platform seamlessly connects with any electronic medical record (EMR) system, allowing healthcare providers to generate authorization requests directly from patient data.

### The Takeaway

Tivara is addressing a significant pain point in the healthcare sector—the slow, cumbersome process of insurance prior authorizations. By leveraging the power of AI and LLMs, they are not just building software but creating a healthcare ecosystem where care is prioritized over cumbersome insurance policies. This focus on empowering doctors to lead care rather than navigating bureaucratic hurdles reflects a deeper understanding of the healthcare landscape.

Whether you’re a clinic looking to streamline operations or a patient hoping for a quicker treatment path, Tivara is gearing up to make those experiences smoother and faster. You can find out more about them at [Tivara's website](https://tivara.com).
